What did I just stumble into?

Webgardens are a nifty little thing made by Corv, previously known as Miss Moss!

Imagine 88x31 buttons... but more.

A webgarden is a 250x250 pixel slice of your website that others can embed onto theirs!

The Nursery

Featuring everyone using Webgardens!

Please let me know on Discord if your pot isn't here and you want it here, or if your pot is here and you don't want it here.

[2025-12-23] Added April!

[2025-11-20] Added oleracea.

[2025-01-30] Added a ton of new pots and did a small revamp of the site to make it easier for me to add more content.

[2025-01-01] Links to my main site were updated. No new Webgardens have been added.
